re: Are political trolls easy to Spot?
Are you good at telling who is a troll and who is not? Can you tell if they just want a reaction with and extreme one? Or the ones who are devils advocates and argue the opposite of what they believeAnswer: Â The trolls Always ask outlandish questions or don't ask anything at all, and they give ridiculous reasons, if any, for their ideas. The more thoughtful a person is, even if he's advocating a stupid or dangerous idea, the less likely I am to think he's a troll.
